questions.question_text:
Potassium chlorate is prepared by the
electrolysis of KCl in basic solution


6OH- + Cl- $$ \to $$ ClO3- + 3H2O + 6e-


If only 60% of the current is utilized in the
reaction, the time (rounded to the nearest hour)
required to produce 10 g of KClO3 using a
current of 2 A is_________.


(Given : F = 96,500 C mol–1; molar mass of
KCIO3 = 122 g mol–1)

reaction, the time (rounded to the nearest hour)
required to produce 10 g of KClO_{3} using a
current of 2 A is_________.
(Given : F = 96,500 C mol^{–1}; molar mass of
KCIO_{3} = 122 g mol^{–1})

options.D: a, c, p are in A.P.

questions.question_text:
Let f : R $$ \to $$ R be defined as

$$f\left( x \right) = \left\{ {\matrix{
   {{x^5}\sin \left( {{1 \over x}} \right) + 5{x^2},} & {x < 0}  \cr 
   {0,} & {x = 0}  \cr 
   {{x^5}\cos \left( {{1 \over x}} \right) + \lambda {x^2},} & {x > 0}  \cr 

 } } \right.$$


The value of $$\lambda $$ for which f ''(0) exists, is _______.
questions.subject: Mathematics
questions.question:
Let f : R $$ \to $$ R be defined as
$$f\left( x \right) = \left\{ {\matrix{
   {{x^5}\sin \left( {{1 \over x}} \right) + 5{x^2},} & {x < 0}  \cr 
   {0,} & {x = 0}  \cr 
   {{x^5}\cos \left( {{1 \over x}} \right) + \lambda {x^2},} & {x > 0}  \cr 

 } } \right.$$
The value of $$\lambda $$ for which f ''(0) exists, is _______.

questions.subject: Physics

questions.question_text:
The density of a solid metal sphere is determined by measuring its mass and its diameter. The
maximum error in the density of the sphere is $$\left( {{x \over {100}}} \right)$$ %.  If the relative errors in measuring the mass
and the diameter are 6.0% and 1.5% respectively, the value of x is_______.
questions.subject: Physics
questions.question:
The density of a solid metal sphere is determined by measuring its mass and its diameter. The
maximum error in the density of the sphere is $$\left( {{x \over {100}}} \right)$$ %.  If the relative errors in measuring the mass
and the diameter are 6.0% and 1.5% respectively, the value of x is_______.

questions.question_text:
Suppose that intensity of a laser is $${{315} \over \pi }$$ W/m2.
 The rms electric field, in units of V/m associated
with this source is close to the nearest integer is __________.


$$ \in $$0 = 8.86 × 10–12 C2 Nm–2; c = 3 × 108 ms–1)
questions.subject: Physics
questions.question:
Suppose that intensity of a laser is $${{315} \over \pi }$$ W/m^{2}. The rms electric field, in units of V/m associated
with this source is close to the nearest integer is __________.
$$ \in $$_{0} = 8.86 × 10^{–12} C^{2} Nm^{–2}; c = 3 × 10^{8} ms^{–1})
